title: Give the area statement with detailed calculation chart of each floor of the building or area as per
clause_text: Give the area statement with detailed calculation chart of each floor of the building or area as per periphery line of construction (P-line) excluding ducts and voids; Show the pump rooms, rain water harvesting system, sewage treatment plant, if any;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
